name: JetPack - Pixel Game
description:
Now Jack has a Jetpack!
 
Jack always dreamed of flying like a bird and so he constructed a jetpack for himself. But flying on a jetpack was not so easy. Jack will meet many obstacles in the sky: tall trees, rain, lightning, a tornado, and, of course, VOLCANOES!
 
Help Jack pass all the tests and become a champion in a jetpack flying in extreme weather.
 
How far can you go?
 
Addictive gameplay: flying on a jetpack with constantly deteriorating weather and limited lives!
Dynamic complexity: the farther - the harder. Bet, you won’t get 1000 points!
Nice graphics: nice pixel design!
Unexpected obstacles: from rain clouds to huge volcanoes!
 
Jack is ready! And you?
 
Download now!
